title: Entering into a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between the Open University of Sri Lanka and the Graduate School of Environmental and Life Science, Okayama University, Japan
decision_details: - In view of promoting the activities of organizing student, faculty and staff exchange programmes, collaborative research, instructional and cultural programmes and exchanging research information, the proposal made by the Minister of Education to sign a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between the Open University of Sri Lanka and the Graduate School of Environmental and Life Science, Okayama University, Japan, was approved by the Cabinet.
